title: Simple Present Third Person – Make Sentences
prompt: Create 3–5 sentences in the simple present tense using third person singular subjects (he, she, it). Focus on daily habits.
hint: Use he / she / it + verb with -s or -es. Talk about what a person does every day.
sample: She gets up at six every morning. He plays basketball after school. It rains a lot in spring in my hometown.

ja.prompt: 三人称単数（he, she, it）を主語にして、現在形の文を3～5文作ってください。主に毎日の習慣について書きましょう。
ja.hint: 主語が he / she / it のときは、動詞に -s / -es をつけます。
ja.sample: 彼女は毎朝6時に起きます。彼は放課後にバスケットボールをします。私の故郷では春によく雨が降ります。

zh.prompt: 請用 he / she / it 當主語，寫出 3～5 句一般現在時的句子，內容可以是每天的習慣。
zh.hint: 主詞是 he / she / it 時，動詞要加 -s 或 -es。
zh.sample: She gets up at six every morning. He plays basketball after school. 在我家鄉，春天常常下雨。

title: Correct the Third Person -s / -es
prompt: Read the sentences and correct the verbs so they match the third person singular subject.
hint: Look for he / she / it. Fix the verb form so it ends with -s or -es.
sample:
Wrong: She go to school every day. → Correct: She goes to school every day.
Wrong: He play the piano. → Correct: He plays the piano.

ja.prompt: 文を読み、主語が三人称単数（he, she, it）のときに、動詞の形を正しく直してください。
ja.hint: he / she / it のとき、動詞は -s / -es をつけます。
ja.sample:
誤：She go to school every day.
正：She goes to school every day.
誤：He play the piano.
正：He plays the piano.

zh.prompt: 閱讀句子，將動詞改成正確的一般現在時三單形。
zh.hint: 看到 he / she / it，就檢查動詞是否加上 -s / -es。
zh.sample:
錯：She go to school every day.
對：She goes to school every day.
錯：He play the piano.
對：He plays the piano.

title: Daily Routine – He / She
prompt: Describe the daily routine of one person (he or she) in 4–5 sentences using the simple present tense.
hint: Start with what time he/she gets up, then talk about school, hobbies, and bedtime.
sample: He gets up at seven o’clock. He eats breakfast with his family. He goes to school by bus. After school, he watches TV and does his homework. He goes to bed at ten.

ja.prompt: 一人の1日の生活（he または she）について、現在形で4～5文で説明してください。
ja.hint: 起きる時間、学校、趣味、寝る時間などの順で書くとわかりやすいです。
ja.sample: 彼は7時に起きます。家族と朝ごはんを食べます。バスで学校へ行きます。放課後はテレビを見て宿題をします。10時に寝ます。

zh.prompt: 用一般現在時寫 4～5 句，描述一個人（he 或 she）的一天作息。
zh.hint: 可以依順序寫：起床、上學或上班、興趣、睡覺時間。
zh.sample: He gets up at seven o’clock. He eats breakfast with his family. He goes to school by bus. After school, he watches TV and does his homework. He goes to bed at ten.

title: Ask and Answer About Habits
prompt: Write 3 questions and 3 short answers about someone’s habits using do/does and the simple present tense.
hint: Use Does he / she…? for questions. Answer with Yes, he/she does. or No, he/she doesn’t.
sample:
Does she like coffee? Yes, she does.
Does he play soccer after school? No, he doesn’t.
Does she watch TV every night? Yes, she does.

ja.prompt: 誰かの習慣について、現在形を使って3つの疑問文と3つの短い答えを書いてください。
ja.hint: 疑問文は Does he / she ...?、答えは Yes, he/she does. / No, he/she doesn’t. を使います。
ja.sample:
Does she like coffee? Yes, she does.
Does he play soccer after school? No, he doesn’t.
Does she watch TV every night? Yes, she does.

zh.prompt: 用一般現在時寫 3 個問句和 3 個簡短答句，問的是某人的習慣。
zh.hint: 問句用 Does he / she…?，回答用 Yes, he/she does. 或 No, he/she doesn’t.
zh.sample:
Does she like coffee? Yes, she does.
Does he play soccer after school? No, he doesn’t.
Does she watch TV every night? Yes, she does.

title: He, She or It?
prompt: Create 4–5 sentences using different subjects: he, she and it. Make sure each verb has the correct -s or -es form.
hint: Change the verb for each subject. Example: He reads, she watches, it flies.
sample: He reads a book every night. She watches cartoons after school. It flies over the city every morning.

ja.prompt: 主語を he, she, it に変えながら、4～5文を現在形で作ってください。動詞の形に注意しましょう。
ja.hint: 主語によって動詞に -s / -es をつけます。例：He reads, she watches, it flies。
ja.sample: 彼は毎晩本を読みます。彼女は放課後アニメを見ます。それ（鳥など）は毎朝町の上を飛びます。

zh.prompt: 輪流使用 he、she、it 當主語，寫出 4～5 句一般現在時句子，動詞要用正確的 -s / -es 形式。
zh.hint: 依主詞改變動詞：He reads, she watches, it flies。
zh.sample: He reads a book every night. She watches cartoons after school. It flies over the city every morning.

title: Write About a Classmate
prompt: Choose a classmate and write 4–5 sentences about what he or she usually does in a week.
hint: Use always / usually / often to talk about how often he or she does something.
sample: She usually arrives at school early. She often helps the teacher. She always does her homework. She sometimes plays the piano after school.

ja.prompt: クラスメート一人を選び、その人が一週間でよくすることについて4～5文で書いてください。
ja.hint: always / usually / often などの頻度を表す語を使うと自然になります。
ja.sample: 彼女はたいてい早く学校に着きます。よく先生を手伝います。いつも宿題をします。放課後にときどきピアノを弾きます。

zh.prompt: 選一位同學，用一般現在時寫 4～5 句，描述他或她一週當中常做的事情。
zh.hint: 可以用 always / usually / often 這些頻率副詞。
zh.sample: She usually arrives at school early. She often helps the teacher. She always does her homework. She sometimes plays the piano after school.
